Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is available 24/7 where as teachers are not. I can get instant feedback from GenAI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is usually more constructive whereas sometimes i feel the feedback I get from teachers can do more harm than good.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI provides more feedback and it can provide it to me in many different ways if i don't understand it.
